segments.text: Hi , Carlos . What are you doing this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I was just wondering if you would come by and give me a hand with the fliers for next week ’ s party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , Melissa . I really can ’ t today . I ’ Ve just got too much going on . Maybe tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
